span.span: Configures run-time throughput settings that enable you to tune service performance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类可控制各种吞吐量设置，以帮助避免应用程序内存不足。Use the class to control various throughput settings that help prevent your application from running out of memory. 属性可限制当前在整个 中处理的消息数目。The property limits the number of messages that currently process across a . 属性可限制在整个 中一次执行的 对象数。The property limits the number of objects that execute at one time across a . 属性可限制 对象可以接受的会话数。The property limits the number of sessions a object can accept. 因为运行时负载平衡需要运行应用程序的经验，所以，通过应用程序配置文件使用 是修改执行过程以获得最佳服务性能的最常用方法。Because run-time load balancing requires experience running the application, using the through an application configuration file is the most common method of modifying execution to maximize service performance. > [!NOTE] > 每次达到这些属性值时，就会记录一个跟踪。A trace is written every time the value of these properties is reached. 第一个跟踪将记录为警告。The first trace is written as a warning. 你还可以使用应用程序配置文件中的[<serviceThrottling>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicethrottling)元素来设置此属性的值。You can also set the values of this attribute by using the [<serviceThrottling>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicethrottling) element in an application configuration file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从配置文件中使用 ，举例来说，它可将 、 和 属性设置为 1。The following code example shows the use of from an application configuration file that sets the , , and properties to 1 as an example. 对于任何特定应用程序，其最佳设置取决于实际经验。Real-world experience determines what the optimal settings are for any particular application. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定服务中 对象的最大数目。The property specifies the maximum number of objects in the service. 牢记 属性和 属性之间的关系是很重要。It is important to keep in mind the relationship between the property and the property. 如果 为 ，则结果值将为总会话数。If is , the resulting value is the total number of sessions. 如果 为 ，则结果值将为并发调用的数量。If is , the resulting value is the number of concurrent calls. 如果消息到达时， 对象的数目已经达到最大数量，则将保存该消息，直至有 对象关闭。If a message arrives while the maximum number of objects already exist, the message is held until an object closes. 你还可以使用应用程序配置文件中的[<serviceThrottling>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicethrottling)元素来设置此属性的值。You can also set the values of this attribute by using the [<serviceThrottling>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicethrottling) element in an application configuration file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从应用程序配置文件中使用 ，举例来说，它可将 、 和 属性设置为 1。The following code example shows the use of from an application configuration file that sets the , and properties to 1 as an example. 对于任何特定应用程序，其最佳设置取决于实际经验。Real-world experience determines what the optimal settings are for any particular application. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定一个 对象可接受的最多会话数。The property specifies the maximum number of sessions a object can accept. 在此情况下，会话并不仅仅意味着支持可靠会话的信道（例如， 支持会话，但不包括可靠会话），理解这一点很重要。It is important to understand that sessions in this case does not mean only channels that support reliable sessions (for example, supports sessions but does not include reliable sessions). 每个侦听器对象都可以有一个挂起的通道会话，该会话不会计算 的值，直到 WCF 接受通道会话并开始处理消息。Each listener object can have one pending channel session that does not count against the value of until WCF accepts the channel session and begins processing messages on it. 在使用会话的方案中，此属性是最有用的。This property is most useful in scenarios that make use of sessions. 如果将此属性设置为一个小于客户端线程数的值，则来自多个客户端的请求可能会在同一套接字连接中进行排队。When this property is set to a value less than the number of client threads, the requests from multiple clients may get queued in the same socket connection. 如果服务上打开的会话数已达到 `MaxConcurrentSessions`，则会阻止来自尚未与该服务建立会话的客户端的请求，直到该服务关闭其与其他客户端的会话。The requests from the client that has not created a session with the service will be blocked till the service closes its session with the other clients if number of open sessions on the service has reached `MaxConcurrentSessions`. 未被提供服务的客户端请求会超时，而且服务会突然关闭会话。The client requests that are not served get timed out and the service closes the session abruptly. 若要避免这种情况，请从其他应用程序域中运行客户端线程，这样，请求消息就可进入其他套接字连接。To avoid this situation, run the client threads from different app domains so that the request messages go into different socket connections. 你还可以使用应用程序配置文件中的[<serviceThrottling>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicethrottling)元素来设置此属性的值。You can also set the values of this attribute by using the [<serviceThrottling>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicethrottling) element in an application configuration file. ##
